info.name: autohide the menu & sidebar [NBC News]
info.description: Hides the NBC News header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.)
info.additionalInfo:
The red and blue vertical bars at the left edge of the screen are the collapsed header, footer, and sidebar. Mouse over them to restore the element.
  • Reduce the headline size to twice the size of the article font
  • On zoom (ctrl+plus) let the article become wider, but no wider than the screen
